projects.title: Barclays Analytics Project
projects.description: Conducted an in-depth analytical review of Barclays’ financial, operational, and customer datasets. The project included cleaning and restructuring large multi-sheet Excel files, building automated calculations, and generating visual dashboards in Power BI. Applied Python to perform trend analysis, KPI generation, and anomaly detection. The work supported leadership teams in understanding revenue movements, customer churn dynamics, cost structures, and operational inefficiencies across divisions. Delivered comprehensive documentation and automated workflows to reduce repetitive manual reporting.
projects.results: Reduced manual reporting time by 40%, increased visibility into cost-performance patterns, and enabled faster decision-making for financial planning and operational teams.

projects.title: Beagle Street Analytics Project
projects.description: Performed full customer lifecycle analysis for Beagle Street, covering marketing outreach, sales funnels, campaign performance, policy conversions, and customer retention. Built Python scripts to process raw insurance datasets, developed segmentation models, and constructed Tableau dashboards that highlighted engagement bottlenecks. Conducted exploratory analysis to evaluate risk profiles and behavior across customer cohorts. Delivered data-driven recommendations that improved campaign targeting and reduced customer acquisition inefficiencies.
projects.results: Improved customer acquisition targeting, increased policy conversion rates, and helped optimize marketing spend effectiveness.

projects.title: Grenadeale Organics Dashboard Project
projects.description: Designed and deployed a fully interactive Power BI dashboard for Grenadeale Organics, integrating sales, supply chain, inventory, and distribution metrics. Cleaned and merged datasets from multiple sources, applied DAX calculations for dynamic KPIs, and built visual components for SKU-level performance tracking. Automated data refreshes and created forecasting visuals to anticipate stock shortages. The dashboard supported regional decision-making and improved logistics synchronization.
projects.results: Enhanced supply chain visibility, reduced inventory delays, and enabled realtime assessment of sales and distribution performance.

projects.title: JP Morgan Chase Analytics Project
projects.description: Analyzed complex financial and banking datasets to uncover customer behavioral patterns, transaction anomalies, and operational inefficiencies. Developed Python scripts for fraud pattern detection, risk scoring, and customer segmentation. Built Power BI dashboards to visualize transaction volumes, channel usage, customer lifecycle trends, and risk clusters. Delivered data-driven insights that strengthened operational risk frameworks and improved decision-making for compliance and digital transformation teams.
projects.results: Identified transaction anomalies, supported risk mitigation, and improved understanding of customer behavior across multiple banking channels.

projects.title: LittleMedia Data Analysis Project
projects.description: Performed deep analytics on digital media engagement metrics, content distribution patterns, and audience interaction behavior. Used Python to preprocess raw engagement logs, applied correlation analysis to determine content impact, and generated Tableau dashboards visualizing viewer paths, drop-off points, and content consistency. Produced insights that guided decisions around preferred content formats, optimal upload times, and viewer retention strategies.
projects.results: Improved audience retention, optimized content scheduling, and informed strategic multimedia planning.

projects.title: London Bridge Analytics Project
projects.description: Executed geospatial, operational, and temporal analytics for London Bridge visitor and event management. Used GIS tools to map footfall patterns and identify congestion areas. Built Python models to analyze peak times, event-driven visitor surges, and safety indicators. Delivered visual dashboards for real-time resource planning and emergency preparedness.
projects.results: Improved crowd flow monitoring, enhanced operational preparedness, and supported data-driven event planning.

projects.title: ADHD Data Analysis Project
projects.description: Analyzed ADHD datasets including demographics, symptoms, behavioral scores, treatment patterns, and school performance indicators. Cleaned and transformed large datasets in Python, applied statistical testing, and created dashboards to highlight patterns in diagnosis age, treatment outcomes, and risk indicators. Provided support insights for educational structures and caregivers.
projects.results: Delivered insights that supported targeted interventions, academic planning, and improved visibility into behavioral trends.

projects.title: Sales & Gross Profit Dashboard (Excel)
projects.description: Built a dynamic Excel dashboard using pivot tables, slicers, and automated KPIs to analyze product-wise, region-wise, and month-wise sales and profit metrics. Integrated formulas and conditional formatting to highlight trends and outliers. Produced a user-friendly interface for leadership review.
projects.results: Enabled executives to monitor sales performance and profitability trends more effectively.

projects.title: Google Sheets Automated Data Table
projects.description: Developed automated Google Sheets dashboards integrating Apps Script for periodic updates, error checks, and real-time visual metrics. Built advanced formulas, conditional formatting logic, and automated charts that refreshed on schedule. Eliminated manual update tasks for operational teams.
projects.results: Saved several hours weekly by replacing manual reporting with automated workflows.

projects.title: Plant/Factory Database Interactive Dashboard
projects.description: Constructed a factory operations dashboard integrating production data, inventory logs, workforce hours, and machinery performance. Connected Power BI to SQL databases, built custom DAX KPIs, and created drill-down views for plant managers. Enabled operational teams to diagnose inefficiencies rapidly.
projects.results: Improved production efficiency monitoring and accelerated decision-making for factory output optimization.

projects.title: Billing Process Completion Dashboard
projects.description: Tracked billing operations across multiple clients, integrating weekly updates, automated indicators, and dynamic filters. Designed performance metrics for billing completeness, delays, and region-wise submission patterns. Built a streamlined reporting process reducing manual preparation time.
projects.results: Enhanced billing transparency, reduced reporting turnaround time, and improved client communication.

projects.title: Student Graduation Readiness SIS Dashboard
projects.description: Developed a graduation readiness dashboard within PowerSchool combining credit requirements, course completion, attendance, GPA, and risk indicators. Cleaned and merged SIS datasets using Python and Excel. Created tools that helped counselors monitor student progress and highlight at-risk students.
projects.results: Improved intervention timing and increased graduation tracking accuracy.

projects.title: Regional Performance Dashboard Development
projects.description: Built a performance dashboard covering multiple districts with KPIs on productivity, financials, and engagement metrics. Integrated monthly updates and advanced filtering in Power BI and Excel. Provided leadership with a consolidated view of all regional activities.
projects.results: Enabled region-level benchmarking and significantly improved data consolidation workflows.

projects.title: Gaming Hours Calculator & Gaming Reduction Planner
projects.description: Designed a behavioral analytics tool in Google Sheets to calculate gaming hours, identify peak gaming times, and plan gradual reduction strategies. Added interactive graphs, automated summaries, and progress trackers. Supported clients in understanding and adjusting their digital habits.
projects.results: Provided clear insights into gaming behavior and improved adherence to reduction goals.

projects.title: Engaged Traffic & Tutorial Funnel Analysis
projects.description: Analyzed digital user flows using Tableau to map landing engagement, tutorial entry steps, completion rates, and exit points. Cleaned and processed engagement logs in Excel. Identified user drop-off triggers, content confusion points, and behavior patterns.
projects.results: Improved tutorial completion rates and optimized digital user flow design.

projects.title: GNSS Data Analytics for Earthquake Patterns
projects.description: Studied GNSS displacement patterns, seismic activity logs, and environmental data using Python and R. Built correlation heatmaps, displacement time series, and deformation models. Used scientific plotting tools to examine pre-quake signals and post-event responses.
projects.results: Generated valuable insights into displacement anomalies and early warning pattern recognition.

projects.title: Chicago Taxi Trip Data Analysis
projects.description: Analyzed large-scale taxi trip datasets including trip duration, distance, fares, weather effects, payment methods, and surge conditions. Built ARIMA-based forecasting models to estimate future trip trends. Generated Python visualizations to highlight route efficiency and high-demand times.
projects.results: Identified operational inefficiencies, peak-demand windows, and payment preference patterns.

projects.title: Retail Store Decision Support System
projects.description: Built a DSS integrating sales history, customer segments, inventory levels, and promotional effects. Used Python for forecasting and segmentation, Power BI for executive dashboards, and Excel for operational summaries. Produced models supporting pricing, demand planning, and inventory strategies.
projects.results: Improved decision-making and increased profitability through enhanced sales insights.

projects.title: TechHaven Web-Based Retailer Relational Database
projects.description: Developed a relational database architecture for orders, products, customers, and inventory. Created SQL queries, optimized schema relations, and connected dashboards in Power BI for real-time business monitoring. Delivered insights into order trends, stock levels, revenue cycles, and customer segments.
projects.results: Strengthened operational transparency and improved analytics-driven decision-making.

projects.title: Spatial Data Science – Understanding Geostatistics
projects.description: Explored spatial distribution of real-world incident data using ArcGIS and R. Carried out point pattern analysis, nearest-neighbor metrics, kernel density mapping, and distribution summaries. Applied spatial descriptive statistics and Python-based data cleaning workflows.
projects.results: Gained deeper insight into spatial clustering and supported geospatial decision-making.

projects.title: SmartMart Retail Sales Analysis & Recommendations
projects.description: Analyzed a retail grocery dataset using Python and Excel to uncover purchase trends, customer behavior, product associations, and operational constraints. Built Power BI dashboards capturing regional performance, category profitability, and discount effectiveness. Delivered data-backed strategic recommendations.
projects.results: Enhanced sales strategy, improved product placement decisions, and increased operational efficiency.

projects.title: London Housing Data Analysis
projects.description: Analyzed housing prices, crime metrics, and demographic distribution across London neighborhoods. Used Python to conduct correlation analysis, trend modeling, and data visualization with Seaborn. Highlighted affordability concerns, high-risk areas, and market behavior patterns.
projects.results: Identified long-term housing price patterns and regional risk indicators.

projects.title: India Census 2011 Data Analysis
projects.description: Processed large demographic datasets using Python, applying grouping, aggregations, and visualizations to understand population distributions, literacy levels, gender ratios, and regional disparities. Produced structured reports suitable for policy and academic usage.
projects.results: Generated clean demographic insights that supported population research and policy planning.

projects.title: Police Dataset Analysis
projects.description: Analyzed traffic stop records to explore gender differences, violation categories, drug searches, and stop durations. Performed preprocessing, filtering, and visualization in Python. Highlighted systemic disparities and enforcement patterns.
projects.results: Produced insights into traffic enforcement behavior and trends across demographic groups.

projects.title: Car Dataset Analysis
projects.description: Analyzed automotive datasets to understand price relationships, mileage patterns, regional differences, and outliers. Built Python visualizations and summary tables for model comparison. Derived correlations for market patterns.
projects.results: Provided a clear breakdown of car attributes influencing pricing and demand.

projects.title: Weather Data Analysis
projects.description: Performed extensive analysis of weather metrics using Python. Explored unique values, null patterns, temperature distributions, wind patterns, and seasonal variations. Built multiple charts and summary statistics. Answered dataset-specific questions related to conditions and anomalies.
projects.results: Identified weather trends and anomalies through systematic statistical exploration.

projects.title: Netflix Dataset Analysis
projects.description: Analyzed Netflix catalogue data focusing on duplicates, null values, content ratings, categories, directors, release years, and regional content availability. Created visualizations using Matplotlib and applied filtering logic to answer detailed questions on content distribution, rating patterns, and creator contributions.
projects.results: Delivered insights into content trends, rating diversity, and country-specific viewing patterns.

projects.title: SARIMA Forecasting Comparison (Python & R)
projects.description: Implemented SARIMA models separately in Python and R for time-series forecasting. Performed thorough parameter tuning, diagnostic checks, and accuracy comparisons between the two environments. Visualized forecast outcomes and residual diagnostics to understand model strengths and weaknesses across platforms.
projects.results: Provided a comparative evaluation of forecasting accuracy, computational performance, and model behavior between Python and R implementations.

projects.title: Power BI Sales, Profit, Discounts & Geographical Dashboard
projects.description: Developed a comprehensive Power BI dashboard to analyze business performance across sales, profit, discounting strategies, and geographic segments. Built DAX measures, dynamic KPIs, and maps highlighting high-performing and underperforming regions. Integrated Excel-based data cleaning processes.
projects.results: Empowered leadership with a multi-dimensional view of business performance and strategic opportunities.

projects.title: MANP098 – Business Analytics ERP Case Study (Stirling Council)
projects.description: Conducted detailed ERP analytics using Oracle Fusion Cloud for the Stirling Council health and social care division. Mapped processes, analyzed service usage patterns, built KPI frameworks, and developed dashboards for performance tracking. Integrated Excel and Power BI for visual reporting.
projects.results: Improved operational transparency, service quality insights, and ERP-driven decision-making.
